resources.string: [hr]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[hr]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[hr]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[hr]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[hr]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[hr]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[hr]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[hr]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[hr]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[hr]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[hr]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[hr]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[hr]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[hr]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[hr]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[hr]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[hr]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[hr]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[hr]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[hr]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[hr]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[hr]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[hr]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[hr]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[hr]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[hr]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[hr]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[hr]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[hr]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[hr]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[hr]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[hr]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>
Polje za podatke prazno je ili nije valjano

[hr]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[hr]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[hr]The actual content of the binary consent help text here

Dopuštam tvrtki Philips da prikuplja moje podatke o aplikaciji u svrhu njezinog poboljšanja, prilagođavanja i boljeg funkcioniranja, kao i u svrhu integracije s društvenim medijima te prikazivanja relevantnog sadržaja i reklama.

Obavijest o kolačićima

Ova aplikacija upotrebljava Adobe Analytics, uslugu analize ("Adobe Analytics") tvrtke Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited ("Adobe"). Adobe Analytics upotrebljava "kolačiće" ili slične tehnike, a to su tekstne datoteke u aplikaciji koje aplikaciji pomažu u analiziranju općenitih uzoraka upotrebe aplikacije. Prijenosom informacija o upotrebi aplikacije koje generira kolačić tvrtki Adobe, postavka osigurava anonimnost IP adrese prije utvrđivanja zemljopisnog položaja i njezinu zamjenu generičkom IP adresom prije spremanja. U ime tvrtke Philips, Adobe će upotrebljavati te informacije za procjenu vaše upotrebe aplikacije, sastavljanje izvješća o aktivnosti aplikacije za Philips te pružanje drugih usluga tvrtki Philips koje se tiču aktivnosti i uporabe aplikacije. Adobe neće povezati vašu IP adresu s drugim podacima koje ima. Tvrtke Adobe i Philips možete spriječiti u prikupljanju i uporabi podataka (kolačića i IP adrese) ako to odbijete nakon zatvaranja ovog zaslona.
[hr]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

Budući da ste dali suglasnost, tvrtke iz grupacije Philips mogu vas kontaktirati u promocijske svrhe e-poštom, SMS porukom i drugim digitalnim kanalima kao što su mobilne aplikacije i društveni mediji. Kako bismo komunikaciju mogli prilagoditi vašim preferencama i ponašanju te vam pružiti najbolji prilagođeni doživljaj, možemo analizirati i kombinirati vaše osobne podatke. Ti podaci mogu obuhvaćati: 

Podatke koje ste nam ustupili
Podatke koje želite aktivno dijeliti s nama kao što su: vaše ime, datum rođenja ili dob, adresa e-pošte, poštanska adresa, država, spol, telefonski broj, profil društvenih mreža.

Podatke koje prikupimo prilikom vaše interakcije s tvrtkom Philips
Podatke o vašim interakcijama i upotrebi digitalnih kanala tvrtke Philips kao što su društveni mediji, web-mjesta, e-pošta, aplikacije i srodni proizvodi. Ti podaci mogu obuhvaćati: IP adresu, kolačiće, informacije o uređaju, komunikaciju koju pritisnete, pojedinosti o lokaciji i web-mjesta koja posjećujete

Philips će vam dati priliku da u bilo koje vrijeme poništite svoju suglasnost.
Više informacija možete pronaći u Obavijesti o privatnosti tvrtke Philips i Obavijesti o kolačićima tvrtke Philips.

[hr]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[hr]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[hr]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
Primajte promotivne materijale tvrtke Philips na temelju svojih preferenci i ponašanja na mreži
Jeste li sigurni da se želite odjaviti?
Konfiguracija se može promijeniti samo prilikom pokretanja. Kako biste je promijenili, morate ponovo pokrenuti aplikaciju
Došlo je do pogreške prilikom ažuriranja korisničkih podataka. Pokušajte nakon određenog vremena
